record.name: Office Relocation
record.description: Request Office Relocation services for an employee. The service is limited to non-international moves to/from approved Company sites. This includes moving of office equipment to a new location. Transferring phone lines will be provided when possible. Otherwise, a new phone line is provided at the new location.
record.detailedDescription: Request Office Relocation services for an employee. The service is limited to non-international moves to/from approved Company sites. This includes moving of office equipment to a new location. Transferring phone lines will be provided when possible. Otherwise, a new phone line is provided at the new location.
record.options: <form><text id="oldloc" label="Old Location" multiline="true"/><text id="newloc" label="New Location" multiline="true"/></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form><text id="oldloc" label="Old Location" multiline="true"/><text id="newloc" label="New Location" multiline="true"/></form>
